mapper.select: SELECT c.pColor,c.cNo,c.pCode,pf.pfRealName, p.pName, p.pPrice, c.cQty, (c.cQty*p.pPrice) FROM product p, cart c, productfile pf, user u, productoption po WHERE pf.pCode = p.pCode and p.pCode = c.pCode and u.uid = c.uid and c.pColor = po.pColor and pf.pCode = c.pCode and po.pCode = p.pCode

SELECT SUM(subquery.totalPrice) FROM (SELECT c.cQty * p.pPrice AS totalPrice FROM product p, cart c, productfile pf, user u, productoption po WHERE pf.pCode = p.pCode AND p.pCode = c.pCode AND u.uid = c.uid AND c.pColor = po.pColor AND pf.pCode = c.pCode AND po.pCode = p.pCode ) AS subquery

SELECT p.pCode, p.pName, p.pBrandName, p.pPrice, po.pColor, pf.pfRealName FROM product p JOIN productoption po ON p.pCode = po.pCode JOIN productfile pf ON p.pCode = pf.pCode ORDER BY po.pStock desc LIMIT 3
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart (uid, pCode, cQty, pColor) VALUES (#{uid},#{pCode},#{pcQty},#{pColor} )
